DisplayForm.Script: <UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>choiceA.xml</Title> <AutoTransition>100</AutoTransition> <!-- --> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>choiceA.xml</Title> <Description>choiceA.xml</Description> <Message>Press OK or START to proceed.</Message> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
